context_bundle.summary: Drift detection identifies differences between the desired state in Git and the actual state in infrastructure to ensure consistency

onboarding.quick_start: terraform plan -detailed-exitcode && kubectl apply --dry-run=client -f k8s/ && git diff HEAD k8s/
common_patterns: Terraform drift: 'terraform plan -detailed-exitcode' and check exit code 2 for drift detected
Kubernetes drift: 'kubectl get -f deployment.yaml -o yaml > current.yaml && diff deployment.yaml current.yaml'
Git repository drift: 'git status --porcelain' and 'git diff HEAD --name-only'
Automated detection: 'kubeconform -strict -summary k8s/*.yaml' for configuration validation
Drift alerts: 'terraform plan -out=tfplan' and 'terraform show -json tfplan' for programmatic drift analysis
Scheduled checks: 'cron: '0 */6 * * *' for automated drift detection every 6 hours
known_errors: State lock error: 'terraform force-unlock LOCK_ID' after ensuring no other terraform processes
Permission denied: 'kubectl auth can-i get deployments --as=system:serviceaccount:drift:drift-detector'
Connection timeout: 'terraform init' and verify provider configuration and network connectivity
False positives: 'terraform refresh' and ignore computed field changes in drift detection
Git authentication: 'ssh-keyscan github.com >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts' for repository access
